details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Warrior' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Warrior and talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'The 3 Ways of the Warrior'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Fighter and you will be on the path to a Hero. Fighter is the 2nd job of Hero

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/warrior/war-leap-1.png} tip={War Leap}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/warrior/iron-body.png} tip={Iron Body}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/warrior/warrior-mastery.png} tip={Warrior Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/warrior/slash-blast.png} tip={Slash Blast}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/warrior/upward-charge-1.png} tip={Upward Charge}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/weapon-mastery-sword.png} tip={Weapon Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/agile-arms.png} tip={Agile Arms}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/spirit-blade.png} tip={Spirit Blade}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/brandish.png} tip={Brandish}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/flash-blade.png} tip={Flash Blade}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/self-recovery.png} tip={Self Recovery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/chance-attack.png} tip={Chance Attack}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/combo-synergy.png} tip={Combo Synergy}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/endure.png} tip={Endure}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/intrepid-slash.png} tip={Intrepid Slash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/beam-blade.png} tip={Beam Blade}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/rush.png} tip={Rush}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/scarring-sword.png} tip={Scarring Sword}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/advanced-combo.png} tip={Advanced Combo}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/advanced-final-attack.png} tip={Advanced Final Attack}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/power-stance.png} tip={Power Stance}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow.png} tip={Raging Blow}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/combat-mastery.png} tip={Combat Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/magic-crash.png} tip={Magic Crash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/enrage.png} tip={Enrage}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/puncture.png} tip={Puncture}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/advanced-combo-attack-reinforce.png} tip={Advanced Combo Attack - Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/advanced-combo-attack-boss-rush.png} tip={Advanced Combo Attack - Boss Rush}> Advanced Combo Attack - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/advanced-final-attack-opportunity.png} tip={Advanced Final Attack - Opportunity}> Advanced Final Attack - Opportunity_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow-reinforce.png} tip={Raging Blow - Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow-extra-strike.png} tip={Raging Blow - Extra Strike}> Raging Blow - Reinforce and Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow.png} tip={Raging Blow (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/cry-valhalla.png} tip={Cry Valhalla (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/puncture.png} tip={Puncture (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/rising-rage.png} tip={Rising Rage (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/beam-blade.png} tip={Beam Blade (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/final-attack.png} tip={Final Attack (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/brandish.png} tip={Brandish (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/flash-blade.png} tip={Flash Blade (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/intrepid-slash.png} tip={Intrepid Slash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/rush.png} tip={Leap Attack (1st Job), Rush (3rd Job), and Upward Charge (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/beam-blade.png} tip={Beam Blade (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow.png} tip={Raging Blow (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/puncture.png} tip={Puncture (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/rising-rage.png} tip={Rising Rage (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/cry-valhalla.png} tip={Cry Valhalla (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Zelpex and the Hero Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Swordsmanship Skills
extraContent.content:
Upon unlocking your Lv. 140 Hyper Skill, Cry Valhalla, the skill provides a buff that causes skills listed as 'Swordsmanship' skills to trigger additional attacks that damage nearby enemies. This additional attack can only trigger a set amount of times each time the buff is used

Below are a list of skills categorized as 'Swordsmanship' skills:

  • Brandish (2nd Job)
  • Intrepid Slash (3rd Job)
  • Raging Blow (4th Job)
  • Puncture (4th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>

primary.name: Slash Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Damage: 335%, Max Enemies Hit: 6

primary.name: War Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Upward Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 304%.
details: Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together<bp_Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation_>

primary.name: Leap Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Use the Left or Right Arrow Keys to dive towards the given direction
Can also be activated by pressing the Down, Left, or Right Arrow Key and Attack Key together

primary.name: Iron Body
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Max HP: +20%, Damage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Warrior Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Speed: 22, Jump: 10, Max Speed: 20, Max HP Per Level: 20, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Brandish
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward twice at multiple enemies

primary.name: Flash Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 145%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 4 sec.
primary.desc: Dash towards enemies in a given direction
details: Can only be used when enemies are nearby
If no Arrow Key is pressed, you will dash towards the direction you are facing
While dashing, prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Combo Attack
primary.shortDesc: While activated, 40% chance of having the attack added to the Combo Count.\nAttack Power for each Combo Count: +2. Max Combo Count: 5
primary.desc: While toggled, there is a chance to gain a Combo Orb (up to 5) when attacking
details: Grants bonus Attack for each Combo Orb
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect on/off

primary.name: Spirit Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 200 sec, Attack Power of Party Members Including Yourself: +30\nDamage Taken: -30%, Damage Reflection: 500% of damage received.
primary.desc: Grants you and your party flat Attack and increases %Damage Reduction for yourself
details: Additionally while active, when you take damage, you deal some back

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Sword and Axe Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed: +1, Final Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +15%\nDamage +5% when equipped with an Axe.

primary.name: Agile Arms
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal Final Attack damage of 150%.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Intrepid Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 19, Damage: 258%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes forward consecutively at multiple enemies

primary.name: Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Pushed: 12
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: While dashing, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Scarring Sword
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 200 sec., 100% chance to pierce the enemy when attacking while skill is active\nDecreases Accuracy by 20% and Attack Power by 30% of pierced enemy for 20 sec.
primary.desc: While active, your attacks inflict a debuff on enemies
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %Attack and %Accuracy

primary.name: Combo Synergy
primary.shortDesc: Has a 80% chance to gain a combo orb with every attack. Final Damage increases by 5% for each combo orb, total applied between combo orbs. Upon taking a hit, has a 30% chance to add a combo orb
details: Increases %Final Damage provided by each Combo Orb
Increases chance to gain Combo Orbs
Grants a chance to gain a Combo Orb when hit

primary.name: Self Recovery
primary.shortDesc: Restores 4% of Max HP and 4% of Max MP every 4 sec.

primary.name: Chance Attack
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage (to pierced, incapacitated enemies): +25%\nPermanently increases your Critical Rate by 20%.

primary.name: Endure
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Beam Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55. Launches a blade that deal 180% damage 5 times to up to 8 enemies.\nBeam Blade Damage Against Normal Monsters: +180%p\nCooldown: 7 sec.
primary.desc: Launches a blade that pierces enemies in a given direction
details: If no Arrow Key is pressed, a blade is launched towards the direction you are facing
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Raging Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 4, Final attack is critical\nEnhanced Raging Blow - Attack: 4 times, Damage: 344%, and the final two attacks are criticals.\n[Passive Effects: Beam Blade Damage +70%p]
details: The final blow is a guaranteed Critical Hit
When Combo is fully charged, attack deals increased %Damage and the last 2 final blows are guaranteed Critical Hits
[Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/beam-blade.png} tip={Beam Blade (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Puncture
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +50%\nAttacked enemies have a 100% to take 165% damage every 2 sec, for 60 sec. Critical Hits deal 25% more damage to afflicted enemies. When a party member attacks, this increases by 10%
primary.desc: Strikes forward while applying a debuff to enemies hit
details: [Debuff]: Critical Hits against enemy deals increased %Damage and enemy is damaged over time<bp_%Damage increase is reduced for party member Critical Hits_>
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, 100% chance to remove enemies' buffs. For 22 sec, prevents 10 enemies from casting buffs.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs
details: Enemies affected by Magic Crash cannot be affected again for a short period

Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Enrage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 50:\nFinal Damage: +25%, Critical Damage: +20%\nReduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3. For skills that target multiple enemies, Max Enemies Hit won't be reduced below 3.
primary.desc: While toggled, gain increased %Final Damage and %Crit Damage but reduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons)

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Advanced Combo
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage boosted to 10% per Combo Orb, Max Combo Orbs: 10, Double Charge Speed Proc Rate: 80%, Weapon Mastery: Increased by 70%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Increases %Final Damage provided by each Combo Orb
Increases max number of Combo Orbs
Grants chance to gain double Combo Orbs

primary.name: Combat Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Defense Ignored: 50%

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +60%.

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 60%, Damage: 170%, Times Activated: 3.
details: Increases activation chance, %Damage, and number of hits
Now grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Combo Attack - Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Final Damage increased by 2% for each additional combo orb.

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Combo Attack - Opportunity
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Additional 20% chance to charge two combo orbs at once.

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Combo Attack - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Damage increases by 2% when attacking Boss Monster for each combo.

hyperActive.name: Cry Valhalla
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Knockdown Immunity Duration: 30 sec., combo fully charged
While the buff is active, Attack Power: +50, Critical Rate: +30%, Status Resistance: +100, Elemental Resistance: +100%
3 sword strikes periodically occur, dealing 520% damage up to 6 enemies 2 times. Sword strikes occur up to 12 times, with no more occuring afterwards.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
hyperActive.desc: While active, grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Rate and Abnormal Status Resistance
details: While active, Swordsmanship attacks deal additional attacks to nearby enemies<bp_Can only be triggered a fixed amount per buff_Prioritizes bosses with the highest max HP_>
While active, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Upon casting, fully charges your Combo

hyperActive.name: Rising Rage
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: 560%, Number of Attacks: 8, Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 10 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a massive explosion damaging nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Burning Soul Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350. Fully charges combo to the max upon casting. Summon Duration: 75 sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay put (it will respawn if you stray too far).
When you use an offensive skill, attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times every 1 sec with 50% bonus Critical Rate.
Normal - Damage: 680% (While enraged: 770%)
Stationary - Damage: 620% (While enraged: 675%)
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: When used, fully charges your Combo and summons a sword that attacks whenever you attack
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will make it stationary and attack nearby enemies<bp_Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together when first summoning will deploy the sword in the stationary state_Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF a function to always summon in stationary state on cast_>
Deals increased damage while <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/enrage.png} tip={Enrage (4th Job)}> Enraged
The sword's attacks have increased %Crit Rate
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Worldreaver
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 14, Invulnerable while casting.\nCooldown: 25 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Slices nearby enemies in half dealing tremendous damage
details: While casting, you are invulnerable
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Instinctual Combo
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Can be used if you have at least 1 Combo Orb. MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 20 sec
The Combo Orb increases Final Damage, damage to bosses, and Attack Power by 20%.
Decreases the chance of charging Combo Orbs by 50%
Tear in Space: Periodically activates a rift 3 time(s). Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6. Cannot charge the Combo Orb with the Tear in Space.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow.png} tip={Raging Blow (4th Job)}> will to create a 'Tear in Space'
details: Increases <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/combo-attack.png} tip={Combo Attack (2nd Job)}> stat bonuses of %Final Damage, %Boss Damage, and Attack
Decreases chance of obtaining Combo Orbs by 50%

fifthMain.name: Sword Illusion
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 700, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 275%, Attack Count: 4, Chase Cut Activation Count: 12. Afterwards, activates 5 explosion(s), which attack 5 time(s) for 550% damage.\nWhile Combo Attack is active, upon use, increases Final Damage for 8 sec by the Final Damage bonus of the 6 Combo Orbs. Final Damage increase from Combo Orb is additive.\nCooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slashes forward several times and creates an explosion
details: Upon use, briefly increases amount of %Final Damage provided by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/combo-attack.png} tip={Combo Attack (2nd Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/raging-blow.png} tip={Raging Blow (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Raging Blow
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 51, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 530%, Number of Attacks: 4, Final attack is always a critical hit, attack range of Burning Soul Blade normal state is increased\nEnhanced Raging Blow - Attack: 4 times, Damage: 590%, and the final two attacks are criticals, attack range of Instinctual Combo and Burning Soul Blade is increased
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/hero/rising-rage.png} tip={Rising Rage (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Rising Rage
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 230
Damage: 270%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 8, Chase Cuts: 4
Cooldown: 10 sec
[Passive Effect: HEXA Raging Blow Damage: +148%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Spirit Calibur
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting\nDamage: 472%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 14, Chase Cuts: 33, the final blow deals 470% damage 15 times and erupts 48 times.\nCooldown: 360 sec

meta: Hero is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. Hero utilize both One-Handed and Two-Handed Swords and Axes as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Hero can equip Medallions and Shields
